name: 路易·C·K Louis C.K.
intro: Louis C.K. (and sometimes Louie C.K.), is an American stand-up comedian, Emmy-winning television and film writer, actor, producer, and director from Boston, Massachusetts. He currently stars in the FX comedy series Louie, which he also writes, directs, and edits.
birthplace: 美国,华盛顿哥伦比亚特区
